control.name: imageComboBoxEdit1
control.description: Sets the view's NewItemRowPosition property which specifies the new item row's position within a view.

control.name: gridControl1
control.description: When an end user starts to edit the new item row, a new record is added to the data source and the InitNewRow event is raised. This event is handled to initialize the "Quantity", "UnitPrice", "Discount" and "OrderID" fields with default values.
